Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at Racine/Grenshaw
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, Roosevelt, Loomis, Taylor and Racine, due to street blockage near Racine/Grenshaw.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, Roosevelt, Loomis, Taylor and Racine, due to street blockage near Racine/Grenshaw.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Howard and Belmont
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Belmont due to fire department activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Belmont due to fire department activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between 95th and Belmont at this time.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Howard and Belmont to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#8 Halsted

#22 Clark

#36 Broadway

#77 Belmont

#78 Montrose

#80 Irving Park

#81 Lawrence

#84 Peterson

#92 Foster

#96 Lunt

#97 Skokie

#146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express

#148 Clarendon/Michigan Express

#147 Outer Express Drive

#151 Sheridan

#152 Addison

#155 Devon

#201 Central

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
